attributes.title: Review on Donald Trump app
attributes.review: I got this app to see if it would help change my mind about president Trump. President trump is a terrible person who has molested children and does not support black lives matter movement. This app is also not working the best it’s very glitchy.

attributes.title: Bad Everything
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and it was really bad so i recommend giving it a one star rating, it didn’t give me updates, it’s a bias app, and i don’t like trump. it also tried to ruin my phone software

attributes.title: This app makes me uncomfortable
attributes.review: I’m sorry but come on right when I open the app it asked for my phone number, like is trump tryna slide in my dm’s or something!!? Kinda creepy! But this app also made my phone super slow, my keeps glitching suuuuper bad!!!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: WORST APP EVER!!!!! it gave my phone a virus which made my phone BLOW UP! and when i got my new phone i tried to download it again and it took months for it to download. anyways i give this app a 1 star if i could give it 0 stars i would. also don’t vote for trump.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This app is the WORST THING to be invented. It completely glitched out my phone and took up soooo much space!! Please if you guys care about your phones health don’t get this app. Oh and also all countries matter so don’t favor one in particular that would be rude🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💋💕💕💅💅💅🛍🛍🎈🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: dear appstore
attributes.review: may i just start off by saying this app does not work any sort of way. it was super disappointing. wayyyyy to many glitches and who would want to have an app about the president of america like nobody really cares. also this app doesnt provide wifi like are you serious!! soooo many glitches that need fixing if i were you id take this silly app off the appstore. i wouldnt even give this app a 1 star id give it a zero. thank you 🙈✨😋🧚

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: Honestly think this is the worst app in the world. If there was an option to give less than a one star, I would have done so. I would very much like to speak with the manager.

attributes.title: No!
attributes.review: worst app ever i recently joined to be informed about his campaign, but i kept getting pop up ads for joe biden’s campaign (his ads were 100x better then trumps app. i decided to ignore the ads but i kept getting informed about monkeys and nothing about trump!

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: ugh this app told me to sacrifice my cat if i didn’t want them to hack my phone and share all of my personal information. when i did sacrifice my cat they still hacked my phone and shared my personal information🙄

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: This app took 2 days to download every time I click the app it freezes up and takes me back to home screen. Ever since I downloaded it my phone has been glitching.
